Sentencas: In the present study, structural stability of silver under single-chamber conditions has been examined.
Titulo: Structural stability of silver under single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell conditions

Sentencas: Micro-tubular cells made of conventional solid oxide fuel cell materials (Ni-YSZ/YSZ/LSM) with silver paste and silver current-collecting wires (for both electrodes) were prepared.
Titulo: Structural stability of silver under single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell conditions

Sentencas: The cells were operated with methane/air mixture of 25/60 mL min(-1), furnace temperature of 750 degrees C, and at an operating voltage of 0.5 V.
Titulo: Structural stability of silver under single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell conditions

Sentencas: The results showed increasing porosity in the current-collecting silver wire with time, leading to rupture, finally.
Titulo: Structural stability of silver under single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell conditions

Sentencas: It is postulated that the porosity formation could be due to the formation of silver oxide which is highly unstable (volatile) at operating temperature considered in this study.
Titulo: Structural stability of silver under single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell conditions

Sentencas: Furthermore, vaporization and melting of silver due to cell overheating under mixed-reactant conditions is expected.
Titulo: Structural stability of silver under single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell conditions

Sentencas: Based on experimental evidences, it is concluded that silver may not be a good choice to be employed under the above specified operating conditions, as it lacks long-term structural stability.
Titulo: Structural stability of silver under single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell conditions
